forum.content:
One day you will find you light again
Don't you know
Dont't let go
Be strong

Follow your heart
let your love lead through the darkness
Back a place you once knew
i believe,i believe,i believe in you

Follow your dreams
Be yourself an angel of kidness
There's nothing that you can not do
i believe,i believe,i believe in you

urls.title: I Believe in You - Il Divo and Celine Dion

forum.title: 充滿力量的一首歌
